display_long_description:
Cebus is a VR Hand movement-based game where you play as a creature called a Cebus. Run, jump, climb, and swing your way through a variety of unique and challenging maps, each with its own style and mechanics. Explore the Forest, slide across the Ice Map, bounce through the Cloud Map, chill on the Beach Map, or float through space in the Zero Gravity Map.

The game features multiple thrilling game modes to test your reflexes and creativity:

Lazer Maze – Dodge moving lasers in a skill-based obstacle course

Glass Bridge – Step carefully or fall through the wrong panel

Only Up – A vertical parkour challenge; one fall resets your progress

Horror – Navigate dark, suspenseful areas filled with fear and surprises

When you're not exploring or competing, visit the Mall, the social hub where you can fully customize your Cebus. Head to the Shop to unlock cosmetics and tools that change how you play and look. Get items like:

Mod Menus (for fun extras in game)

Size Changer (shrink or grow your Cebus)

Grappling Hook (swing across levels with ease)

And many more fun upgrades

Whether you're mastering movement or showing off your drip, Cebus offers nonstop fun and freedom.
